snippet: New legislation pressed by Pandora Media and other Internet radio services to reduce their royalty rates has touched a nerve in the music industry.
abstract: New legislation, pressed by Pandora Media and other Internet radio services, to reduce royalty rates to musicians touches nerve in the music industry; streaming online music accounts for significant amount of industry's revenue.
lead_paragraph: New legislation pressed by Pandora Media and other Internet radio services to reduce their royalty rates has touched a nerve in the music industry.
